title: Cornell Halts Fraternity Parties After Alleged Sex Assault and Druggings
description: The campus police issued alerts over the weekend that one student was sexually assaulted and at least four others were drugged at off-campus residences affiliated with fraternities.
dc:creator: Hurubie Meko

media:content.media:credit: Heather Ainsworth for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Four Cornell students told police officers that they were “exposed to Rohypnol.”
